tool_description: Machine Learning APIs including Naive Bayes Classifier for natural language, Linear Regression Prediction, Logistic Regression Classification and Time Series Prediction.  自然言語分類器(Naive Bayes)、線形回帰予測、ロジステック回帰分類、時系列予測の機械学習API群。
name: AcroLearner
title: AcroLearner

api_list.name: 0305.Generate Time Series MA Model
api_list.description:
Generate a Moving Average Regression Prediction Model according to the trainText(a Space-separated numeric string dataset) whick inputed in Learning item in advance. In the returned result list, if Coefficient of determination(Score) in last row is close to 1, a satisfying prediction will be available.
学習項目のtrainText(スペース区切りの数値文字列)に予め投入した数値データセットによって、移動平均(MA)モデルを作成する。学習の結果一覧が戻り、最後の決定係数(Score)値は1に近づくなら、良い予測結果が得られる。
<hr>
The following external document is for directly calling AcroLearner original APIs. Some Auth parameters may be neglected here.
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=2&withTitle=true&apiCode=01105016

下記の外部ドキュメントは、AcroLearnerオリジナルAPIに対する資料であり、ここでは一部の認証パラメータを省略します。
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=1&withTitle=true&apiCode=01105016

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description:
学習誤差の戻り間隔
the output interval of learning error

required_parameters.name: learnCount
required_parameters.description:
学習回数
learning time

required_parameters.name: qOrder
required_parameters.description:
Moving Average Regression times for Learning
移動平均回帰の回数

required_parameters.name: learnRate
required_parameters.description:
学習増分比率
learning increment rate

api_list.name: 0405.Get Time Series MA Prediction
api_list.description:
Moving Average Prediction processing is performed, the prediction result will be available.
移動平均(MA)モデルで予測処理を行い、予測結果が返される。
<hr>
The following external document is for directly calling AcroLearner original APIs. Some Auth parameters may be neglected here.

required_parameters.name: startNo
required_parameters.description:
StartNo of the returning prediction result
予測結果戻りの開始順番

required_parameters.name: endNo
required_parameters.description:
EndNo of the returning prediction result
予測結果戻りの終了順番

optional_parameters.name: cyclePeriod
optional_parameters.description:
Cycle period in Learning data
元の学習データ周期

optional_parameters.name: cycleStartNo
optional_parameters.description:
Cycle StartNo in Learning data
元の学習データ周期開始順番

api_list.name: 0307.Generate Time Series ARIMA Model
api_list.description:
Generate an Autoregressive integrated moving average Prediction Model according to the trainText(a Space-separated numeric string dataset) whick inputed in Learning item in advance. In the returned result list, if Coefficient of determination(Score) in last row is close to 1, a satisfying prediction will be available
学習項目のtrainText(スペース区切りの数値文字列)に予め投入した数値データセットによって、自己回帰和分移動平均(ARIMA)モデルを作成する。学習の結果一覧が戻り、最後の決定係数(Score)値は1に近づくなら、良い予測結果が得られる。
<hr>
The following external document is for directly calling AcroLearner original APIs. Some Auth parameters may be neglected here.

api_list.name: 0301.Generate Text Classification Model
api_list.description:
Generate a Naive Bayes Classifier Model according to the trainText(text datasets) whick inputed in Learning item in advance.
学習項目のtrainTextに予め投入したテキストデータセットによって、単純（ナイーブ）ベイズ分類器(Naive Bayes)のモデルを生成する。
<hr>
The following external document is for directly calling AcroLearner original APIs. Some Auth parameters may be neglected here.
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=2&withTitle=true&apiCode=01105008

下記の外部ドキュメントは、AcroLearnerオリジナルAPIに対する資料であり、ここでは一部の認証パラメータを省略します。
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=1&withTitle=true&apiCode=01105008
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com/v0_1/CltService/ml/trains/AAAAAA/bayesmodel"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com/v0_1/CltService/ml/trains/{trainkey}/bayesmodel"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: 0203.Get Learning Item
api_list.description:
Get an Item property of a specified Training Theme.
指定した学習テーマの項目情報を取得します。
<hr>
The following external document is for directly calling AcroLearner original APIs. Some Auth parameters may be neglected here.
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=2&withTitle=true&apiCode=01106003

下記の外部ドキュメントは、AcroLearnerオリジナルAPIに対する資料であり、ここでは一部の認証パラメータを省略します。
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=1&withTitle=true&apiCode=01106003
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com/v0_1/CltService/ml/trains/AAAAA/items/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com/v0_1/CltService/ml/trains/{trainkey}/items/{itemno}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

required_parameters.description: the  unique Key for Machine Learning Theme.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com/v0_1/CltService/ml/trains/yB1o4ucY_DZpUhPeevom-0GTPX3G6JQ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com/v0_1/CltService/ml/trains/{trainkey}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrolearner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: 0302.Generate Linear Regression Model
api_list.description:
Generate a Linear Single or Multiple Regression Prediction Model according to the trainText(Space-separated numeric string datasets) whick inputed in Learning item in advance.
学習項目のtrainText(スペース区切りの数値文字列)に予め投入した数値データセットによって、線形単回帰又は重回帰のモデルを作成する。
<hr>
The following external document is for directly calling AcroLearner original APIs. Some Auth parameters may be neglected here.
https://mars.restgate.net:8443/AcroLearner/v0_1/CltService/apiInfo/doc?appId=10007&language=2&withTitle=true&apiCode=01105010
